# SparsePreconditionerDiagScaling

**Global Variable**

A diagonal scaling preconditioner.

## Declaration

```swift
var SparsePreconditionerDiagScaling: SparsePreconditioner_t { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparsePreconditionerDiagScaling] provides a simple preconditioner for the least squares minimal residual (LSMR) method.

## Constants

- **SparsePreconditionerDiagonal**: A Jacobi preconditioner.
- **SparsePreconditionerNone**: No preconditioner.
- **SparsePreconditionerUser**: A user-provided preconditioner.
title: SparsePreconditionerDiagScaling
